thread.title: Dan Girardi passes Mark Messier for games played, lifts Rangers over Flames 4-1
thread.title_full: Dan Girardi passes Mark Messier for games played, lifts Rangers over Flames 4-1

author: Denis P. Gorman
title: Dan Girardi passes Mark Messier for games played, lifts Rangers over Flames 4-1
text:
I forgot my password No thanks New York Rangers defenseman Dan Girardi (5) and Calgary Flames right wing Michael Frolik (67) skate for the puck in the third period of an NHL hockey game at Madison Square Garden in New York, Sunday, Oct. 25, 2015. The Rangers won 4-1. (Bryan R. Smith/AP) Dan Girardi passes Mark Messier for games played, lifts Rangers over Flames 4-1 Denis P. Gorman NEW YORK — The Associated Press 
Published Sunday, Oct. 25, 2015 10:54PM EDT 
Last updated Sunday, Oct. 25, 2015 10:54PM EDT 
The start of this season has not been seamless for Dan Girardi and the New York Rangers. 
After 10 games, both the player and team hope their games are rounding into shape. 
“He’s coming along,” New York coach Alain Vigneault said after Girardi broke a tie late in the second period in New York’s 4-1 win over the Calgary Flames. Never miss out
